name: Reactor overload (Kenshaku)
description:
Ludum Dare 49 entry

Reactor Overload is a tower defense game where you have to manage an unstable reactor that charges all your towers. The more tower you have on, the more unstable it is, if you reach the limit you are gone.

Controls:

Click on the squares below to display the tower selection menu

Use the following toggle to turn on and of the towers
